data: The thread 'Feedback on marketing proposal' discusses an initial marketing proposal for Q3 campaigns between MarketCo Agency and BrandCo.
The thread 'Feedback on marketing proposal' indicates that the director requested more focus on social media in the marketing proposal.
The thread 'Feedback on marketing proposal' reveals that the marketing lead updated the plan with expanded social media strategies and budget reallocations.
The thread 'Feedback on marketing proposal' specifies that the director asked for a final version including key performance indicators and timelines.
The thread 'Feedback on marketing proposal' includes action items such as revising the budget and clarifying the target audience.
The thread 'Feedback on marketing proposal' highlights that the proposal was well structured but needed more market data.
